name: Underground Madness
description:
In Underground Madness you have to kill all enemies with different weapons like a Pistol, Shotgun or a lasergun.

The goal of the game is to survive the incoming waves of enemies.
After each wave you can pick up a medipack or a random dropped weapon.

Controls

Movement: ASDW

Fire: Left Mouseclick

Dodge: Right Mouseclick (needs cooldown)

Some Credits
